common_1170_rival_02:
Are you bummed that your heartwarming family
reunion got cut off so quickly?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1170_botan_02: There was nothing heartwarming about it![VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1170_botan_03:
We were THIS close to getting caught up in a
nasty brawl![VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1170_botan_04:
Just look at [VAR PKNAME(0001)]. Poor thing’s terrified...
Guess that other one isn’t exactly its pal.[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1170_friend_01:
Yeah, that other Pokémon was giving off some
real bad vibes...[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1170_friend_02:
Uh... Not that you should worry a thing ’bout
any of that![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1170_friend_03:
Once we get you back into your battle form, I’m
sure you’ll be going toe-to-toe against that jerk!\r
If...you know, if you want to.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1170_friend_04: S-sorry... Guess that doesn’t really help, huh...[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1170_botan_05:
Do you think that other [VAR PKNAME(0001)] was one of the
“dangerous Pokémon” the professor warned us\r
to watch out for?[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1170_rival_05:
But didn’t the professor say the dangerous
Pokémon would come out from inside?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1170_friend_05: You mean from inside the gate we just—?[VAR 0114(0006)]
